entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Overcast. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
